column1: Smoque BBQ////For my late lunch and early dinner
column2: I got the sliced brisket sandwich with mac n cheese and coleslaw. I also had a craving for ribs
column3: so I got the St. Louis half rack. Thinking these portions wouldn't fill me up
column4: I was only able to finish the sandwich and mac. With your sandwich
column5: you get to sample both of their sauces
column7: and the Memphis. For both the sandwich and ribs
column8: I used the Memphis. I found that the vinegar-based Carolina concoction was a little too overpowering for both meats. Â
